short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate English words into the user's native language when right-clicked

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "QuickTranslate" is a sleek browser extension for on-the-go translations. Right-click to translate English words or phrases and enjoy a seamless, multilingual browsing experience. Discover "QuickTranslate" and break language barriers effortlessly!
